history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Benedum Geriatric Center
TTS Okay, going to benedum geriatric center. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER No.
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER 11 A.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:00 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 17 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Craig Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 67 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue + Chesterfield Road</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 11:03am. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Messed up.

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 7 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4 Fifth avenue.<break time='500ms'/> To avoid walking up the hill, you can walk to <break strength='weak'/> Falk Medical Building at <break strength='weak'/> 3601 Fifth Ave, and ask for a free escort to benedum geriatric center </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
